languages.text: {n}В глазах сестры Ардженты появляется блеск. Она колеблется, но потом со вздохом качает головой.{/n} "Путь к этой планете утрачен, знания погибли вместе с прежним {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатором{/g} корабля. Заново открыть маршрут потребует неимоверных усилий и ресурсов. У наследни{mf|ка|цы} протектората фон Валанциус наверняка много проблем и забот сейчас. Может быть, позже... когда небо над нашими головами прояснится".

traits.locale_text: {n}В глазах сестры Ардженты появляется блеск. Она колеблется, но потом со вздохом качает головой.{/n} "Путь к этой планете утрачен, знания погибли вместе с прежним навигатором корабля. Заново открыть маршрут потребует неимоверных усилий и ресурсов. У наследни{mf|ка|цы} империи фон Валанциус наверняка много проблем и забот сейчас. Может быть, позже... когда небо над нашими головами прояснится".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta's eyes glint. She hesitates, but then shakes her head with a sigh.{/n} "The path to that planet was lost, all the knowledge is gone along with the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. It would take immense effort and resources to rediscover the route. The heir to the von Valancius protectorate must have plenty of other issues to deal with right now. Perhaps later... when the skies above our heads have cleared."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах сестры Ардженты появляется блеск. Заново открыть маршрут потребует неимоверных усилий и ресурсов. У наследни{mf|ка|цы} протектората фон Валанциус наверняка много проблем и забот сейчас. Может быть, позже... когда небо над нашими головами прояснится".

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的眼睛亮了起来。她犹豫了一会儿，随后叹息着摇了摇头。{/n}“通往那颗行星的航道已经找不到了。随着前任{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的离世，我们所有的知识都遗落了。想要重新找到这条航道，恐怕要耗费大量人力与资源。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的继承人肯定有很多别的问题急需处理。或许过些日子……等到我们头上的天空放晴之后再说也不迟。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes glint. She hesitates, but then shakes her head with a sigh.{/n} "The path to that planet was lost, all the knowledge is gone along with the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. It would take immense effort and resources to rediscover the route. The heir to the von Valancius protectorate must have plenty of other issues to deal with right now. Perhaps later... when the skies above our heads have cleared."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的眼睛亮了起来。她犹豫了一会儿，随后叹息着摇了摇头。{/n}“通往那颗行星的航道已经找不到了。随着前任{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的离世，我们所有的知识都遗落了。想要重新找到这条航道，恐怕要耗费大量人力与资源。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的继承人肯定有很多别的问题急需处理。或许过些日子……等到我们头上的天空放晴之后再说也不迟。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes glint. She hesitates, but then shakes her head with a sigh.{/n} "The path to that planet was lost, all the knowledge is gone along with the previous Navigator. It would take immense effort and resources to rediscover the route. The heir to the von Valancius protectorate must have plenty of other issues to deal with right now. Perhaps later... when the skies above our heads have cleared."

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Argenta destellan. Por un momento duda, pero suspira y menea la cabeza.{/n} «El camino a ese planeta se perdió, y toda la información sobre la ruta desapareció con el anterior {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}. Se necesitarían grandes cantidades de recursos y un esfuerzo considerable para volver a encontrar el camino. Como hereder{mf|o|a} del protectorado von Valancius, debe de tener muchos otros problemas de los que ocuparse. Tal vez más adelante... cuando los cielos estén más despejados».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes glint. She hesitates, but then shakes her head with a sigh.{/n} "The path to that planet was lost, all the knowledge is gone along with the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. It would take immense effort and resources to rediscover the route. The heir to the von Valancius protectorate must have plenty of other issues to deal with right now. Perhaps later... when the skies above our heads have cleared."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Argenta destellan. Por un momento duda, pero suspira y menea la cabeza.{/n} «El camino a ese planeta se perdió, y toda la información sobre la ruta desapareció con el anterior {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}. Se necesitarían grandes cantidades de recursos y un esfuerzo considerable para volver a encontrar el camino. Como hereder{mf|o|a} del protectorado von Valancius, debe de tener muchos otros problemas de los que ocuparse. Tal vez más adelante... cuando los cielos estén más despejados».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの目が輝く。彼女はためらったが、ため息をついて首を振った。{/n}「その惑星への道は失われ、すべての知識は前の{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}とともに消え去った。航路を再発見するには膨大な努力と資源が必要だ。フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の後継者は、今は他に対処すべき問題がたくさんあるはずだ。おそらくは後に…我らの頭上の空が晴れ渡った後になることだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes glint. She hesitates, but then shakes her head with a sigh.{/n} "The path to that planet was lost, all the knowledge is gone along with the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. It would take immense effort and resources to rediscover the route. The heir to the von Valancius protectorate must have plenty of other issues to deal with right now. Perhaps later... when the skies above our heads have cleared."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの目が輝く。彼女はためらったが、ため息をついて首を振った。{/n}「その惑星への道は失われ、すべての知識は前の{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}とともに消え去った。航路を再発見するには膨大な努力と資源が必要だ。フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の後継者は、今は他に対処すべき問題がたくさんあるはずだ。おそらくは後に…我らの頭上の空が晴れ渡った後になることだろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Augen funkeln. Sie zögert, schüttelt dann jedoch seufzend den Kopf.{/n} "Der Pfad zu diesem Planeten ist verloren gegangen. Sämtliches Wissen ist zusammen mit der früheren {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatorin{/g} verschwunden. Es würde immense Mühen und Ressourcen erfordern, die Route wiederzuentdecken. {mf|Der Erbe|Die Erbin} des Protektorats von Valancius hat doch gewiss viele andere Dinge zu tun. Vielleicht später ... wenn der Himmel über unseren Köpfen aufgeklart hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes glint. She hesitates, but then shakes her head with a sigh.{/n} "The path to that planet was lost, all the knowledge is gone along with the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. It would take immense effort and resources to rediscover the route. The heir to the von Valancius protectorate must have plenty of other issues to deal with right now. Perhaps later... when the skies above our heads have cleared."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Augen funkeln. Sie zögert, schüttelt dann jedoch seufzend den Kopf.{/n} "Der Pfad zu diesem Planeten ist verloren gegangen. Sämtliches Wissen ist zusammen mit der früheren {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatorin{/g} verschwunden. Es würde immense Mühen und Ressourcen erfordern, die Route wiederzuentdecken. {mf|Der Erbe|Die Erbin} des Protektorats von Valancius hat doch gewiss viele andere Dinge zu tun. Vielleicht später ... wenn der Himmel über unseren Köpfen aufgeklart hat."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux Argenta s'illuminent l'espace d'un instant. Elle semble hésiter, avant de secouer la tête en soupirant.{/n} « Les coordonnées de cette planète ont été perdues, tout ce qui la concernait était seulement connu du précédent {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}. Il faudrait déployer maints efforts et ressources pour en retrouver l'emplacement. J'imagine que l'{mf|héritier|héritière} du protectorat von Valancius a des affaires bien plus pressantes à régler. Peut-être plus tard... lorsque les cieux au-dessus de nos têtes se seront éclaircis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes glint. She hesitates, but then shakes her head with a sigh.{/n} "The path to that planet was lost, all the knowledge is gone along with the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. It would take immense effort and resources to rediscover the route. The heir to the von Valancius protectorate must have plenty of other issues to deal with right now. Perhaps later... when the skies above our heads have cleared."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux Argenta s'illuminent l'espace d'un instant. Elle semble hésiter, avant de secouer la tête en soupirant.{/n} « Les coordonnées de cette planète ont été perdues, tout ce qui la concernait était seulement connu du précédent {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}. Il faudrait déployer maints efforts et ressources pour en retrouver l'emplacement. J'imagine que l'{mf|héritier|héritière} du protectorat von Valancius a des affaires bien plus pressantes à régler. Peut-être plus tard... lorsque les cieux au-dessus de nos têtes se seront éclaircis. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın gözleri parlıyor. Tereddüt edip iç çekiyor, ardından başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Sabık {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı'yla{/g} birlikte o gezegene giden yol ve ilgili tüm bilgiler kayboldu. Rotayı bulmak, çok çaba ve kaynak gerektirecektir. Von Valancius protektorasının vârisi hayli meşgul olmalı. Bilahare belki... Hele bir önümüzü görelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes glint. She hesitates, but then shakes her head with a sigh.{/n} "The path to that planet was lost, all the knowledge is gone along with the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Perhaps later... when the skies above our heads have cleared."

Tereddüt edip iç çekiyor ve başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Sabık {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'yla birlikte o gezegene giden yol ve ilgili tüm bilgiler kayboldu. Rotayı bulmak için çok çaba ve kaynak gerekecektir. Von Valancius protektorasının vârisi hayli meşgul olmalı. Bilahare belki... Hele bir önümüzü görelim."
